Formula-building rule for existential quantifier (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)

 Formula-building rule for existential quantifier (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
exbidh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
exbidh.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
exbidh $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps <-> E. x ch ) ) $.
